timeline.bodyText: Is this going to be addressed in this PR?
timeline.author: sayas01

replies.bodyText: I was intending to go and verify that I got one of the expected objects, but the flagged objects don't (currently) allow me to get the original AtlasObject back out. I could do some reflection to get it working, but I'd prefer to avoid that when I'm not unit testing that specific class.
replies.author: tsmock
